00034     Extractor* ExtractorFactory::getExtractor(const std::string& featureType,
00035                                               unsigned int frameLength,
00036                                               unsigned int paramsPerFrame)
00037     {
00038         if ("MFCC" == featureType)
00039         {
00040             return new MfccExtractor(frameLength, paramsPerFrame);
00041         }
00042         else if ("Energy" == featureType)
00043         {
00044             return new EnergyExtractor(frameLength);
00045         }
00046         else if ("Power" == featureType)
00047         {
00048             return new PowerExtractor(frameLength);
00049         }
00050         else
00051         {
00052             throw Exception("Unknown feature type: " + featureType);
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00064     Extractor* ExtractorFactory::getExtractor(const FeatureHeader& hdr)
00065     {
00066         return getExtractor(hdr.type, hdr.frameLength, hdr.paramsPerFrame);
00067     }
